Class Serializer

    • model.Serializer

    public class Serializer
extends java.lang.Object

    Saves and loads Inventory data to a file

      • DataStoreExists

        public boolean DataStoreExists(java.lang.String storeName)
        Determines whether the passed store name is a valid filename and exists as a file in the current working directory
        Specified by:
        DataStoreExists in interface IPersistence
        Parameters:
        storeName - The name of the store to verify
        Returns:
        True if the name is valid and the store exists. False if either condition is not true.

      • DataStoreNameIsValid

        public boolean DataStoreNameIsValid(java.lang.String storeName)
        Determines whether the passed store name is a valid file name
        Specified by:
        DataStoreNameIsValid in interface IPersistence
        Parameters:
        storeName - The name to check for validity
        Returns:
        True if the name is a valid store name. Otherwise, false

      • LoadData

        public void LoadData(Inventory inventory,
            java.lang.String storeName)
        Loads all data from specified store to the passed Inventory
        Specified by:
        LoadData in interface IPersistence
        Parameters:
        inventory - The Inventory to load the data to
        storeName - The filename of the data store to load data from (based on the current working directory)

      • SaveData

        public void SaveData(Inventory inventory,
            java.lang.String storeName)
        Saves all data from the Inventory to a file with the specified name
        Specified by:
        SaveData in interface IPersistence
        Parameters:
        inventory - The Inventory to save
        storeName - The filename of the store (based on the current working directory)
